body_html:
Extract the cuDNN archive to a directory of your choice, referred to below as .
Then follow the platform-specific instructions as follows.

LINUX

cd <installpath>
export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=`pwd`:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH

Add <installpath> to your build and link process by adding -I<installpath> to your compile
line and -L<installpath> -lcudnn to your link line.

It works for me.

It works for me.
body:
Extract the cuDNN archive to a directory of your choice, referred to below as <installpath>.
Then follow the platform-specific instructions as follows.

LINUX

    cd <installpath>
    export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=`pwd`:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH

    Add <installpath> to your build and link process by adding -I<installpath> to your compile
    line and -L<installpath> -lcudnn to your link line.

It works for me.
